jasperReport.name: master
jasperReport.queryString:
select clase.rdn as clase, f."total_cantidad_envase1" as "total_bultos", f."n._palets" as "cantidad_palets", f."tableId" as "tableId_factura", f.idto as "idto_factura", f."rdn" as "cod_factura", f."causa_rectificación" as causa, f."portes_pagados" as "portes_pagados_factura", f."observaciones_a_imprimir" as "observaciones_factura", f."fecha" as "fecha_factura", f."importe" as "importe_factura", f."su_referencia" as "su_referencia_factura", f.base as base, f."total_iva" as "total_iva_factura", f."recargo" as "recargo_factura", f."retención" as "retencion_factura", f."porcentaje_retención" as "porcentaje_retencion_factura", c.rdn as "cod_cliente", c.nombre as "nombre_cliente", c."dirección" as "direccion_cliente", c."código_postal" as "codigo_postal_cliente", c."NIF-CIF-VAT" as "NIF-CIF-VAT_cliente", c."teléfono" as "telefono_cliente", c."móvil" as "movil_cliente", c.fax as "fax_cliente", c.nombre_comercial as "nombre_comercial_cliente", l.rdn as "localidad_cliente", p.rdn as "provincia_cliente", pa.rdn as "pais_cliente", agente.rdn as "cod_agente_comercial", d."código_postal" as "codigo_postal_envio", d."dirección" as "direccion_envio", d."teléfono" as "telefono_envio", d.receptor as "receptor_envio", d.horario_entrega as "horario_entrega_envio", dl.rdn as "localidad_envio", dp.rdn as "provincia_envio", dpa.rdn as "pais_envio", trans.nombre as "nombre_transportista", trans."NIF-CIF-VAT" as "DNI_transportista", me.nombre as "nombre_mi_empresa", me."NIF-CIF-VAT" as "NIF-CIF-VAT_mi_empresa", me."dirección" as "direccion_mi_empresa", me."código_postal" as "codigo_postal_mi_empresa", lme.rdn as "localidad_mi_empresa", pme.rdn as "provincia_mi_empresa", pame.rdn as "pais_mi_empresa", me."teléfono" as "telefono_mi_empresa", me.fax as "fax_mi_empresa", me.email as "email_mi_empresa", me."página_web" as "web_mi_empresa", me.logo as "logo_mi_empresa", ct."matrícula" as "matricula_transporte", idiomas.rdn as idioma
from v_documento as f left join v_agente_comercial as agente on(f.agente_comercial=agente."tableId" and f."agente_comercialIdto"=agente.idto) inner join "v_sujeto_comercial" as c on( (c."tableId"=f."cliente" and c."idto"=f."clienteIdto") or (c."tableId"=f."proveedor" and c."idto"=f."proveedorIdto")) left join localidad as l on(l."tableId"=c.localidad) left join provincia as p on(p."tableId"=c."provincia") left join "país" as pa on(pa."tableId"=c."país") left join "dirección" as d on(d."tableId"=f."dirección_envío") left join localidad as dl on(dl."tableId"=d.localidad) left join provincia as dp on(dp."tableId"=d."provinciaPROVINCIA") left join "país" as dpa on(dpa."tableId"=d."país") left join "transportista" as trans on(trans."tableId"=f."transportista") left join "control_transporte" as ct on(ct."tableId"=f."control_transporte") left join mi_empresa as me on(f.mi_empresa=me."tableId") left join localidad as lme on(lme."tableId"=me.localidad) left join provincia as pme on(pme."tableId"=me."provinciaPROVINCIA") left join "país" as pame on(pame."tableId"=me."país") inner join clase on(clase.id=f.idto), idiomas
where
idiomas."tableId"=$P{idioma}::int and f."tableId"*1000 +f.idto in($P!{documento}) order by f.rdn;

staticText.text: Total punto verde incluido en factura:
